article_title: VIDEO: Father photographed daughter every day, gave her video on 18th birthday
article_text:
Six thousand five hundred seventy-five. That’s how many photos a father took of his daughter to create a video for her on her 18th birthday.

Metro reported that 41-year-old Munish Bansal photographed his daughter every day since she was born on on May 16, 1996.

The father said he wanted to capture all the special moments of her life, From her first smile, her baby steps to her first day at school.
